results.content: Probably really good if you're a brand new developer (as in, no html/css/other cms experience at all) as everything is explained thoroughly, but it's a little slow paced otherwise. Rather too much than too little explanation though I guess!
results.content_html: Probably really good if you're a brand new developer (as in, no html/css/other cms experience at all) as everything is explained thoroughly, but it's a little slow paced otherwise. Rather too much than too little explanation though I guess!

results.content:
A solid foundation on MODX CMS. Mike covered all the basics and a walks through on how to create a basic website, where he not only teaches MODX but also shows how to improve on search engines ranking, which was my best part, very few instructors speaks about SEO.

I am a web developer coded web application using MVC frameworks and I used WordPress as well, but after taking this course I feel really confident and already developed a production ready simple website. 

So excited that I had also enrolled on MODX intermediate course as well.

results.content:
Very useful to others who want to learn a CMS to create a website project for customer. Easy to follow but sometime it may be more concise if the presenter use slideshow more than trying to demonstrate in real time.

Also, should be mention that some video it feel sleepy. I mostly play around 1.5x speed. :D

results.content: This course was great - I've not found many courses teaching MODX, and this one introduces it step by step, creating a website in stages together with the instructor. Thank you very much - I'll be on to the Intermediate Course next!
results.content_html: This course was great - I've not found many courses teaching MODX, and this one introduces it step by step, creating a website in stages together with the instructor. Thank you very much - I'll be on to the Intermediate Course next!

results.content: Mike has created an excellent course that will get you building up and running with Modx within a (long) day. You do need to have some prior knowledge but if you get stuck, the knowledge you need is only a google away. I took the long route of installing Modx on a free AWS instance which was  bit of a challenge and now I only need to harden Modx by moving core out of the document root, to have a fully functional secure website. Modx is the most fun to use CMS yet. I choose it as my new go to favourite after a lot of research where my 2nd choice was Expression Engine. Highly recommended.
results.content_html: Mike has created an excellent course that will get you building up and running with Modx within a (long) day. You do need to have some prior knowledge but if you get stuck, the knowledge you need is only a google away. I took the long route of installing Modx on a free AWS instance which was bit of a challenge and now I only need to harden Modx by moving core out of the document root, to have a fully functional secure website. Modx is the most fun to use CMS yet. I choose it as my new go to favourite after a lot of research where my 2nd choice was Expression Engine. Highly recommended.

results.content:
latest version main.css does not contain the error class.

Also, you should add that you need to add domain in .htaccess in the form

RewriteEngine On
RewriteBase /mydomain

for Friendly URLs to work on MAMP on a Mac
results.content_html:
latest version main.css does not contain the error class.

Also, you should add that you need to add domain in .htaccess in the form

RewriteEngine On
RewriteBase /mydomain

for Friendly URLs to work on MAMP on a Mac

results.content: That's a very good course at a reasonable pace. It is easy to follow and provides a bunch of good examples of how MODX can be used. If somebody is starting using MODX that's certainly a very valuable course. It's an excellent course for beginners. Thank you Mike. Good job!
results.content_html: That's a very good course at a reasonable pace. It is easy to follow and provides a bunch of good examples of how MODX can be used. If somebody is starting using MODX that's certainly a very valuable course. It's an excellent course for beginners. Thank you Mike. Good job!

results.content: I would like to see more on the server side setup to ensure the server has all the proper packages to support modx for those who do not use cpanel/whm or alternative but rather work with terminals directly.
results.content_html: I would like to see more on the server side setup to ensure the server has all the proper packages to support modx for those who do not use cpanel/whm or alternative but rather work with terminals directly.

results.content: Mike, has opened my eyes to a whole new world for content management. This course is easy to follow and if you do run into any hurdles. Well, Mike is there to give you a helping boost, to overcome that hurdle. I do have to say that ModX is an awesome platform with endless possibilities.

results.content: Not only a great foundation for MODX CMS websites, the lessons on SEO and social media make this an invaluable course for setting up websites in general.
results.content_html: Not only a great foundation for MODX CMS websites, the lessons on SEO and social media make this an invaluable course for setting up websites in general.

results.content: This course gives you a basic knowledge of MODX and how to get up and running. Not a lot of depth into settings, user roles or using extras. This will give you just enough to get your feet wet.
results.content_html: This course gives you a basic knowledge of MODX and how to get up and running. Not a lot of depth into settings, user roles or using extras. This will give you just enough to get your feet wet.

results.content:
All in all an excellent course. It's well suited to a beginner in modx.
I especially liked the sections on google analytics and social media tags. This is an area I am not so familiar with.
I only found the method used for creating extra folders in the file structure to be cumbersome. This functionality is build into the modx files section, and does not require you to use your hosting file manager.
results.content_html:
